items.sentence: I don't think you should go to work if you still have a cough.
I injured my knee the day before yesterday and it still hurts.
We didn't have time to play all the songs that were requested.
The beach, bordering the Gulf of Mexico, teemed with tarballs.
Tom was the one who washed the dishes after dinner last night.
It was clear to Tom that Mary wasn't going to change her mind.
Mary's obsessive tidying up is really getting on Tom's nerves.
Tom focuses on the positive and doesn't dwell on the negative.
Tom's backyard is full of junk he's picked up at garage sales.
I want to know what happened to the gun you received from Tom.
